Package app.Models

Class Request

java.lang.Object
app.Models.Request
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RequestContinuation
public class Request extends Object implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI
Represents a request in a sensor network, encapsulating the details needed to perform a query, including the client's connection info and the query code itself. This class conforms to the RequestI interface, defining the structure for requests in the sensor network system.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Request

      public Request(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.QueryI queryCode, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.ConnectionInfoI client)
      Constructs a Request with specified query code and client connection information. Automatically assigns a unique URI to each request using AbstractPort.generatePortURI().
      Parameters:
      queryCode - The QueryI code that specifies what operation is to be performed.
      client - The ConnectionInfoI providing details about the client's connection.

      public String requestURI()
      Retrieves the unique URI for this request.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
      A string representing the unique URI of the request.

    • getQueryCode

      public fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.requests.interfaces.QueryI getQueryCode()
      Retrieves the query code associated with this request.
      Specified by:
      getQueryCode in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI
      Returns:
      The QueryI instance defining the operation of this request.

    • isAsynchronous

      public boolean isAsynchronous()
      Indicates whether the request is to be processed asynchronously. Currently, this implementation always returns false, indicating synchronous processing.
      Specified by:
      isAsynchronous in interface fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI
      Returns:
      A boolean value, always false, indicating that this request does not support asynchronous processing.

    • clientConnectionInfo

      public fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.ConnectionInfoI clientConnectionInfo()

      Returns:
